description.@en: Exorcizamus te, omnis immundus spiritus, omnis satanica potestas omnis incursio infernalis adversarii!

effect.@en: When facing a creature that is classified of an Abyssal or Supernatural nature, make an Interrogation Test. If successful, they remain Stunned for a number of Turns equal to your [WB]. However, this only works if the creature can both see and hear you clearly. You also understand how to use the Ritual of Exorcism. Substitute Interrogation in place of Incantation when using the Ritual of Exorcism, but you cannot Channel Power.
